freemarker.core

类 StringArraySequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • freemarker.core.StringArraySequence
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    TemplateModel, TemplateSequenceModel

    public class StringArraySequence
extends Object
implements TemplateSequenceModel
    Sequence variable implementation that wraps a String[] with relatively low resource utilization. Warning: it does not copy the wrapped array, so do not modify that after the model was made!

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 freemarker.template.TemplateModel

        NOTHING

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        public TemplateModel get(int index)
        从接口复制的说明: TemplateSequenceModel
        Retrieves the i-th template model in this sequence.
        指定者:
        get 在接口中 TemplateSequenceModel
        返回:
        the item at the specified index, or null if the index is out of bounds. Note that a null value is interpreted by FreeMarker as "variable does not exist", and accessing a missing variables is usually considered as an error in the FreeMarker Template Language, so the usage of a bad index will not remain hidden, unless the default value for that case was also specified in the template.

      • size

        public int size()
        指定者:
        size 在接口中 TemplateSequenceModel
        返回:
        the number of items in the list.
